TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreData extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示会话存储的会话状态数据。

span.span: Represents session-state data for a session store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由 ASP.NET 和自定义会话状态存储的实施者使用，以将会话状态信息传递给和 。The class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the . 类用于表示会话存储的会话状态数据 。The class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the . 对象包含当前会话的会话状态变量名称和值、静态对象引用和 信息。The object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and information for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示会话存储的会话状态数据 。The class is used to represent session-state data for a session store to the . 对象包含当前会话的会话状态变量名称和值、静态对象引用和 信息。The object contains the session-state variable names and values, static object references, and information for the current session. 类由 ASP.NET 和自定义会话状态存储的实施者使用，以将会话状态信息传递给和 。The class is used by ASP.NET and implementers of a custom session-state store to pass session-state information to and from the . 自定义会话-商店实现者 在 、 和方法的实现中构造对象 。Custom session-store implementers construct a object in implementations of the , , and methods.

summary.span: 当前会话的会话变量和值。

span.span: The session variables and values for the current session.

value.span: 包含当前会话的变量和值的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains variables and values for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用类引用向 ASP.NET 应用程序代码公开的会话状态变量 ，该类是使用 当前或实例的属性访问的 。The property references the session-state variables that are exposed to ASP.NET application code using the class, which is accessed using the property of the current or the instance. 默认情况下，会话状态变量是使用对象管理的 。By default, session-state variables are managed using the object. 自定义会话-商店实现者可以提供自己的 接口实现。Custom session-store implementers can supply their own implementation of the interface.

summary.span: 获取由 ASP.NET 应用程序文件 Global.asax 中的 标记声明的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects declared by tags within the ASP.NET application file Global.asax.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含在 Global.asax 文件中声明的对象。

span.span: An containing objects declared in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须向The 提供属性是为了与 ASP 的早期版本兼容。 property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP. 自定义会话-商店实现者可以 使用方法获取对当前实例的类的引用 。Custom session-store implementers can obtain a reference to the class for the current instance using the method. > [!NOTE] > 存储在集合中的自定义对象 必须支持二进制序列化。Custom objects stored in the collection must support binary serialization. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [二进制序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization)。For more information, see [Binary Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization).

summary.span: 获取或设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time, in minutes, allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 超时期限（以分钟为单位）。
